A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie was a massive let-down in my opinion.\n\nThe tone was dissected by dumb\, cringy jokes. Even Yoda has been turned into a sassy\, comic relief character. So much of the film - like the casino scene and every scene with Finn - felt like \"padding\". The Last Jedi made me realise all the questions raised in The Force Awakens were raised to turn Star Wars into the next Marvel universe: a predictable\, toneless cash-cow.
